sense.gloss: to hold in one's arms, to carry in one's arms, to carry under one's arm, to hold (one's head) in one's hands
to have (problems, debts, etc.), to take on (a responsibility), to be burdened with (e.g. care of a family member), to have (children, etc.) to provide for
to employ, to have (on one's staff), to hire
to hold in one's arms (e.g. a baby), to embrace, to hug
to have (a thought or feeling), to hold, to harbour (suspicion, doubt, etc.), to harbor, to bear (a grudge, ill will, etc.), to entertain (hope, illusions, etc.), to cherish (e.g. an ambition)
to hold in one's arms (e.g. a baby), to embrace, to hug
to have sex with, to make love to, to sleep with
to hold in one's arms (e.g. a baby), to embrace, to hug
hug, carrying in one's arms (a baby, pet, doll, etc.)
embrace, hug, holding in one's arms
to hug someone close, to hold someone tight, to embrace closely

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑外来↑↓がいらい↓↑思想↑↓しそう↓に↑偏見↑↓へんけん↓を↑抱↑↓だ↓いているようだ。
sdata.e: You seem to be prejudiced against ideas that come from foreign countries.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓は、↑概↑↓がい↓して↑自分↑↓じぶん↓たちの↑抱↑↓かか↓えている↑問題↑↓もんだい↓を↑理解↑↓りかい↓してくれる↑教師↑↓きょうし↓が↑好↑↓す↓きだ。
sdata.e: Students generally like a teacher who understands their problems.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑主義↑↓しゅぎ↓を↑抱↑↓だ↓いている。
↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑誰↑↓だれ↓でも↑芸術↑↓げいじゅつ↓には↑多↑↓おお↓かれ↑少↑↓すく↓なかれ↑興味↑↓きょうみ↓を↑抱↑↓だ↓いている。
sdata.e: Every one of us is more or less interested in art.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓か↑新年↑↓しんねん↓の↑抱負↑↓ほうふ↓があるの？
sdata.e: Did you make any New Year's resolutions?

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓ひと↓つには、↑西洋↑↓せいよう↓↑人↑↓じん↓ではない↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓が↑自分↑↓じぶん↓たち↑独自↑↓どくじ↓の↑文化↑↓ぶんか↓に↑誇↑↓ほこ↓りを↑持↑↓も↓ち↑始↑↓はじ↓めてきたためと、また↑一↑↓ひと↓つには、フォークを↑使↑↓つか↓わないそれらの↑地域↑↓ちいき↓は↑最↑↓もっと↓も↑高↑↓たか↓い↑出生↑↓しゅっしょう↓↑率↑↓りつ↓の↑地域↑↓ちいき↓を↑抱↑↓かか↓えているという↑理由↑↓りゆう↓から、このことは↑当↑↓あ↓たっている。
sdata.e: This is true partly because non-Westerners have begun to take pride in their own cultures and partly because those areas of the world where forks are not used have some of the highest birth rates.

sdata.j: ↑医者↑↓いしゃ↓は↑困難↑↓こんなん↓な↑問題↑↓もんだい↓を↑抱↑↓かか↓えています。
↑偉大↑↓いだい↓な↑作家↑↓さっか↓たちは、↑誰↑↓だれ↓でも↑英語↑↓えいご↓に↑関心↑↓かんしん↓を↑抱↑↓だ↓いていたようだ。
sdata.e: Every great writer seems to have been interested in English.

sdata.j: ↑案↑↓あん↓の↑定↑↓じょう↓、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑疑念↑↓ぎねん↓を↑抱↑↓だ↓いていた。
ろうそくの↑両端↑↓りょうたん↓を↑燃↑↓も↓やすことは、↑極↑↓きわ↓めて↑簡単↑↓かんたん↓にろうそくを↑溶↑↓と↓かすことになる - ↑美女↑↓びじょ↓を↑両↑↓りょう↓↑脇↑↓わき↓に↑抱↑↓かか↓え↑込↑↓こ↓んだプレイボーイのように。
sdata.e: Burning the candle at both ends reduces the candle to wax in a hurry - just like a playboy having a pretty girl on each arm.

words.gloss: to hold in one's arms, to carry in one's arms, to carry under one's arm, to hold (one's head) in one's hands
to hold in one's arms (e.g. a baby), to embrace, to hug
